name: LD51
description:
You find yourself aboard a long forgotten space vessel, unfortunately the security systems are still active. Avoid raising the alarm and getting caught, and find your way to the escape pods.

*NOTE:* Currently got an annoying issue with the mouse capture on the web build - if you run into it, try pressing P a few times to toggle the pause menu and get back to normal gameplay.

A first person game with some (hopefully) Thief-like visibility gameplay.

Controls (also introduced in-game):
WASD to move
P to pause
Mouse to look/turn
C toggles crouching
Q and E to lean/peek.
